mainPage.name: Jakub Stranianek
mainPage.mainText: Hi, my name is Jakub and I'm dedicated to creating websites and simple web apps. If you are interested in cooperation, do not hesitate to contact me

portfolio.sectionText: Welcome to the portfolio section! Here you will find my created projects that I have included in my portfolio. Discover the combination of design and functionality in each project. Browse and look for mistakes so I can improve!
